question: ISRO has successfully maneuvered the Chaser and Target satellites to a 3-meter range under which programme, aimed at testing the indigenous Bharatiya Docking System?

The RBI has constituted a committee for the Framework on Responsible and Ethical AI (FREE-AI) in the financial sector, chaired by ________, to ensure ethical adoption, governance, and risk management.
options: Dr. Rajiv Kumar, NITI Aayog Vice Chairman
Dr. C. Rangarajan, Former RBI Governor
Dr. Raghuram Rajan, Economist and Former RBI Governor
Dr. Pushpak Bhattacharyya, Professor, IIT Bombay
Dr. Abhijit Banerjee, Nobel Laureate in Economics
answer: Dr. Pushpak Bhattacharyya, Professor, IIT Bombay

question: Which Indian institution ranked 99th in computer science in THE World Rankings 2025, marking the first time an Indian institution has been in the global top 100 for this subject?

The Indian Navy commissioned its latest multi-role stealth-guided missile frigate, INS Tushil. Which of the following statement/statements is/are correct?
1 - Guided missile frigate INS Tushil (F 70) was commissioned into the Indian Navy at Kaliningrad, Russia, by Defence Minister Rajnath Singh.
2 - The INS Tushil is an upgraded Krivak-III class frigate under Project 1135.6.
3 - The INS Tushil joined the "Sword Arm of the Indian Navy", the Western Fleet, under the Western Naval Command.
options: All of the above are correct.
answer: All of the above are correct.

1. Interest rates must be reset at least once every three months for applicable loans.
2. Borrowers must be informed about changes in EMI/tenor due to interest rate resets during the loan tenure.

options: To prevent deforestation and support sustainable rubber production
To increase the yield of rubber trees
To focus on enhancing rubber product exports

answer: To prevent deforestation and support sustainable rubber production
